page.title: 07Housing in Pitsea and Vange.
page.content:
Pitsea was a village area surrounded by farmland.Now Pitsea has become part of Basildon new town.Vange which is also covered by our grid reference, was also a small village now incorporated into Basildon new town. Much of the housing is Basildon council or Basildon corporation property. Most of this property are terraced houses. There are also some flats and these are mainly 3 storeys. There are some sheltered housing schemes for old people with a warden to look after them. There is also some private housing in the area and most of these houses are detached.
By a group from Pitsea Junior School.
